title: Find specific files
description: Find all files named 'sample_doc.txt' within the 'data' directory and its subdirectories.
man_page_info:
find - search for files in a directory hierarchy.
Example: find [PATHNAME] [EXPRESSION]
Key expressions: -name (filename), -type (f for file, d for dir), -user (owner).

input_details.prompt_for_command: Enter the find command to locate 'sample_doc.txt' in the 'data' directory:

hints: Use the 'find' command. Specify the starting directory first.
The '-name' option is used to search for files by their name.
